modName: Stormcloak Officer Heroic Armor - Replacer Version
summary: Just a replacer version I made, since the original creator quit the modding scene.
descriptionHtml:
[b]NOTE[/b]:
Immersive Armors - [i]MUST[/i],[i] MUST[/i] be installed for it to display correctly!
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?
(Install Immersive Armors, then install this replacer)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Howdy [u][i][b]great[/b][/i][/u] peeps,

After seeing what an awesome looking armor this,
I decided to re-upload it as a replacer (many also asked for it in the comments).

Now the officers don't look like peasants, but like real warriors!

I highly recommend using the:
(For making the Stormcloaks look like a somewhat realistic army)
-Friendly Guard Helmets (open Stormcloak/guard helmets)
-Town Guards Armor Re-Texture (Gives the Stormcloak/guards proper outfits)
-Optional boots & gauntlet Stormcloak version of the above (so they don't look like fur)
-Stormlord Armor (For Ulfric, which looks MUCH better)

Original creator: lumps
He gave me permission to re-upload, if crediting him as author.

Enjoy.

Kind regards,
Mike
author: WikusVanDerMerwe   lumps

files.name: Stormcloak Officer Heroic Armor - Replacer Version
